mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", b.name AS "province.name", a.province_id AS "provinceId", c.name AS "city.name", a.city_id AS "cityId", d.name AS "area.name", a.district_id AS "districtId", e.name AS "street.name", a.street_id AS "streetId", f.name AS "goodsName", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.type AS "type", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.account_id AS "accountId"

LEFT JOIN system_province b ON a.province_id = b.id LEFT JOIN system_city c ON a.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system_area d ON a.district_id = d.id LEFT JOIN system_street e ON a.street_id = e.id LEFT JOIN mb_goods f ON a.goods_id = f.id LEFT JOIN system_operator g ON a.account_id = g.id LEFT JOIN system_operator_role h ON g.id = h.operator_id LEFT JOIN system_role i ON h.role_id = i.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_region_goods( province_id, city_id, district_id, street_id, goods_id, type, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, account_id )VALUES ( #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{districtId}, #{streetId}, #{goodsId}, #{type}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE md_region_goods SET province_id = #{provinceId}, city_id = #{cityId}, district_id = #{districtId}, street_id = #{streetId}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, type = #{type}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, account_id = #{accountId} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE md_region_goods SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE md_region_goods SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE id=#{id}
